SavingsAccount Class Reference

A simple abstract base class to represent a SavingsAccount.

#include <savingsAccount.h>

void SavingsAccount::updateMonthEnd (  )  [virtual]

This function will calculate and add the interest earned to the balance at the end of the month.

Postcondition:
the balance is increased by the amount of interest earned
